title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1023.13 - Tire changes and repairs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1023.13 - Tire changes and repairs

State Regulations

Tire changes and repairs shall not be made in or upon
vehicular crossings, except when authorized by a Triborough Bridge and Tunnel

Authority employee, properly identified, and under his
direction. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1023.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
